all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Verily, verily, I say unto you, except ye abide my law ye cannot attain to this glory.
Doctrine and Covenants 132:21
Quote of the Day
"Spiritual transformation can come as we strive to honor the covenants we have made with the Lord by living in obedience to His commandments."
Elder Ulisses Soares | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
